snippet: The judge overseeing the proposed $765 million settlement in the N.F.L. concussion case appointed a special master to help analyze the final agreement, which could be filed in days.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Anita B Brody, who is overseeing the proposed $765 million settlement between the NFL and more than 6,000 players who sued the league for negligence and fraud, has appointed Perry Golkin as special master to help analyze the final agreement, which could be filed in days.
lead_paragraph: The judge overseeing the proposed $765 million settlement in the N.F.L. concussion case appointed a special master to help analyze the final agreement, which could be filed in days.

headline.main: In N.F.L. Case, Help in Analyzing Deal
headline.print_headline: In N.F.L. Case, Help in Analyzing Deal
